articles.author: Emily Davies, Cat Zakrzewski
articles.title: Inside USA House: The converted church that left a MAGA mark on Davos - The Washington Post
articles.description: As Europeans worked furiously to divert a crisis over the president’s threatened takeover of Greenland, his allies took over this Swiss alpine village.
articles.content: DAVOS, Switzerland The man who introducedDonald Trump to Melania Knauss wanted to infuse the worlds most elite economic conference with the spirit of MAGA. So Paolo Zampolli hauled a sculpture of a b… [+118 chars]
